title: Rotating game modes

embed.description: This time around, Nexus Siege will run through the following dates: Friday 9/12: 11am - 3am AEDT Saturday 10/12: 11am - 3am AEDT Sunday: 11/12: 11am - 3am AEDT Monday 12/12: 11am - 3am AEDT As always we'll be trying out different things with the rotating game mode queue and we'd love to hear your feedback.

body: Why do we have 3 week of poro King like come on its Christmas can't we have like one for all or urf to be honest no one likes poro King, nexus seige or acension and you know it's so posed to be rotating 3 weeks of the same thing doesn't feel like its rotating

replies.body: tbh urf gets old very fast

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=AmgnawEA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-12T21:04:10.395+0000)
>
> tbh urf gets old very fast

Oh and the other game modes don't. You know the ones that show up 2x - 3x the amount that urf does.

They have just updated to make poro king fun. it has always been a change from normals and ranks and i love playing it every week end as a break something new it never gets old. I respect that they did this for 3 weeks as a celebration of christmas
is thats whats up with the snaxs in the item builds, and on that matter, im in the old client and cant edit my item builds, i thought this was only an issue in the NEW client
